arts.sum: Auxerre come into Sunday's welcome of Montpellier on a run of just two wins in their last 14 in the league. That said, while they have struggled to turn draws into wins at home, they have lost just ju...

arts.ttl: Preview: Auxerre vs. Montpellier HSC - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Ligue 1 clash between Auxerre and Montpellier HSC, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
